title: Book, "Sculpture: or, the history and art of chalcography, and engraving in copper . . .", 1662
title_raw: Sculpture: or, the history and art of chalcography, and engraving in copper . . .
description: By John Evelyn (1620–1706). Printed by J. C. for G. Beedle and T. Collins. Vertical rectangle. 148 p. + [3 p.]; bound in worn brown leather (original binding). Frontis: engraving of figure holding tablet inscribed: History of chalcography by J. E.; lower left: J. E. inve; lower right: AH scu. Tipped in: a copy of Prince Ruprecht's (1619–1682) portrait of the Executioner by Houston (?). First edition.

tombstone.epitaph: Book, "Sculpture: or, the history and art of chalcography, and engraving in copper . . .", 1662. Paper. 1950-30-31.
